GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/plants.description: serves an array of all plants

GET /api/plants/:plant_id.description: serves a singular plant object of the given plant id

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a user object of the specified username

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: Updates the username of a given user and returns the new user object

GET /api/myPlants/:username.description: Serves up an array of plant objects belonging to the given user

POST /api/myPlants/:username/:plant_id.description: Adds the plant of the given plant_id to the myPlants section of the given user

DELETE /api/myPlants/:username/:my_plant.description: Deletes the plant of the given plant_id from the myPlants section of the given user

PATCH /api/myPlants/:username/:plant_id.description: Updates the nickname of the given plant in the myPlants section of the given user
